main event: A bright light was observed near Blauvelt, New York on July 4, 1965 from around 4:45 AM for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared round and bright, staying in the same spot at first.
The object then started to make slight movements around 5:15 AM.
The object's brightness would pulse, becoming bright and then dull repeatedly.
The witness felt that something was not quite normal about the object.
The report was written at 5:00 AM the same day.
